The claim was supported by Marco Rubio: a conservative champion and politician, who has been vocal about his concerns regarding government spending and the growing deficit.
The claim was repeated by Rubio multiple: suggesting that it is a key talking point in his campaign.
The claim was referenced in an Associate: which reported on the government's increasing debt and the percentage of borrowed money in the federal budget.
Policy and economic experts: including Brian Riedl from the Heritage Foundation, confirmed the accuracy of the claim and stated that the figures in the White House's budget summary support Rubio's statement.
